00073 void TelnetServer::StartServer(void)
00074 {
00075     const int i_ServerSocket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00076     if (i_ServerSocket < 0)
00077     {
00078         const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00079             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "socket() failed")
00080             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction socket()");
00081         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00082         return;
00083     }
00084 
00085     struct sockaddr_in s_SockAddr;
00086     s_SockAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00087     s_SockAddr.sin_port = htons((unsigned short) m_ulTcpPort);
00088     s_SockAddr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00089 
00090     if (bind(i_ServerSocket, (struct sockaddr*) & s_SockAddr, sizeof(s_SockAddr)) < 0)
00091     {
00092         close(i_ServerSocket);
00093         const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00094             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "bind() failed")
00095             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction bind()");
00096         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00097         return;
00098     }
00099 
00100     if (listen(i_ServerSocket, 5) < 0)
00101     {
00102         close(i_ServerSocket);
00103         const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00104             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "listen() failed")
00105             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction listen()");
00106         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00107         return;
00108     }
00109 
00110     while (1)
00111     {
00112         const ResourceString cli_InfoWaiting = ResourceString()
00113             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Waiting for clients...")
00114             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "En attente de clients...");
00115         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << cli_InfoWaiting.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00116         const int i_ConnectionSocket = accept(i_ServerSocket, NULL, NULL);
00117 
00118         if (i_ConnectionSocket < 0)
00119         {
00120             close(i_ServerSocket);
00121             const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00122                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "accept() failed")
00123                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction accept()");
00124             m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00125             return;
00126         }
00127 
00128         const ResourceString cli_InfoClient = ResourceString()
00129             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Accepting telnet connection")
00130             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Connexion telnet acceptée");
00131         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << cli_InfoClient.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00132         if (! AcceptConnection(i_ConnectionSocket))
00133         {
00134             return;
00135         }
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 const bool TelnetServer::AcceptConnection(const int I_ConnectionSocket)
00140 {
00141     int i_Pid = 0;
00142 
00143 #if CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00144     if (i_Pid = fork())
00145     {
00146         // Server side.
00147         return true;
00148     }
00149     else
00150 #endif
00151     {
00152         // Connection side.
00153 #ifndef CLI_WIN_NETWORK
00154         i_Pid = getpid();
00155 #else
00156         i_Pid = GetCurrentThreadId();
00157 #endif
00158         const ResourceString cli_InfoStart = ResourceString()
00159             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Connection started")
00160             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Début de connexion");
00161         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM)
00162             << cli_InfoStart.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang())
00163             << " " << i_Pid << cli::endl;
00164         TelnetConnection* const pcli_Connection = new TelnetConnection(m_cliShell, I_ConnectionSocket, true);
00165         m_cliShell.Run(*pcli_Connection);
00166         const ResourceString cli_InfoEnd = ResourceString()
00167             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Connection done")
00168             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Début de connexion");
00169         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM)
00170             << cli_InfoEnd.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang())
00171             << " " << i_Pid << cli::endl;
00172 #if CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00173         exit(0);
00174 #endif
00175         return true;
00176     }
00177 }

00200 const bool TelnetConnection::CloseDevice(void)
00201 {
00202 #if CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00203     close(m_iSocket);
00204 #endif
00205     delete this;
00206     return true;

00209 const KEY TelnetConnection::GetKey(void) const
00210 {
00211     if (! m_qChars.IsEmpty())
00212     {
00213         // Dequeue the received characters
00214         const int i_Front = m_qChars.RemoveHead();
00215 
00216         // Special character management.
00217         switch (i_Front)
00218         {
00219         case 27:
00220             if (! m_qChars.IsEmpty())
00221             {
00222                 if ((m_qChars.GetHead() == 91) && (m_qChars.GetCount() >= 2))
00223                 {
00224                     m_qChars.RemoveHead();
00225                     const int i_Special = m_qChars.RemoveHead();
00226 
00227                     switch (i_Special)
00228                     {
00229                     case 65: return KEY_UP;
00230                     case 66: return KEY_DOWN;
00231                     case 67: return KEY_RIGHT;
00232                     case 68: return KEY_LEFT;
00233                     default:
00234                         // Unhandled.
00235                         if ((! m_qChars.AddHead(i_Special))
00236                             || (! m_qChars.AddHead(91)))
00237                         {
00238                             GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00239                                 << "TelnetConnection::GetKey(): "
00240                                 << "Unable to restore previously removed character from m_qChars"
00241                                 << endl;
00242                     }
00243                 }
00244             }
00245             }
00246             break;
00247 
00248         case 8:
00249             return BACKSPACE;
00250         }
00251 
00252         const KEY e_Char = IODevice::GetKey(i_Front);
00253         if (e_Char != NULL_KEY)
00254         {
00255             return e_Char;
00256         }
00257         else
00258         {
00259             return GetKey();
00260         }
00261     }
00262     else
00263     {
00264         // Wait for characters
00265         char str_Buffer[256];
00266         const int i_Len = recv(m_iSocket, str_Buffer, 256, 0);
00267         if (i_Len <= 0)
00268         {
00269             const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00270                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "recv() failed")
00271                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction recv()");
00272             GetErrorStream() << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00273             return NULL_KEY;
00274         }
00275         else
00276         {
00277             for (int i=0; i<i_Len; i++)
00278             {
00279                 if (str_Buffer[i] != '\0')
00280                 {
00281                     if (! m_qChars.AddTail(str_Buffer[i]))
00282                     {
00283                         GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00284                             << "TelnetConnection::GetKey(): "
00285                             << "Could not append character '" << str_Buffer[i] << "' "
00286                             << "to m_qChars" << endl;
00287                 }
00288             }
00289             }
00290             return GetKey();
00291         }
00292     }
00293 }
00294 
00295 void TelnetConnection::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00296 {
00297     if (STR_Out != NULL)
00298     {
00299         const int i_Len = send(m_iSocket, STR_Out, strlen(STR_Out), 0);
00300         if (i_Len != (signed) strlen(STR_Out))
00301         {
00302             const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00303                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "send() failed")
00304                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction send()");
00305             GetErrorStream() << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00306 
00307             if (i_Len < 0)
00308             {
00309                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "send failed" << endl;
00310             }
00311             else if ((unsigned) i_Len < strlen(STR_Out))
00312             {
00313                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00314                     << "send uncomplete"
00315                     << " (only " << i_Len << " characters sent"
00316                     << " over " << strlen(STR_Out) << ")" << endl;
00317             }
00318             else if ((unsigned) i_Len > strlen(STR_Out))
00319             {
00320                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00321                     << "strange send return value"
00322                     << " (" << i_Len << " for " << strlen(STR_Out) << " characters sent)" << endl;
00323             }
00324         }
00325     }
00326 }

00332 const OutputDevice& TelnetConnection::GetErrorStream(void) const
00333 {
00334     // First try to send error to the device set in the shell.
00335     if (const OutputDevice* const pcli_ErrorDevice = & m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM))
00336     {
00337         if (pcli_ErrorDevice != this)
00338         {
00339             // Do not report error to this device which has caused the error.
00340             return *pcli_ErrorDevice;
00341         }
00342     }
00343 
00344     // Default to standard error.
00345     return OutputDevice::GetStdErr();
00346 }
